DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the prevalence of metabolic syndrome amongst obese children in our region with a body mass index (BMI) above the 95th percentile for age and sex.
DOC.brief_title: The Incidence of Metabolic Syndrome Among Obese Children in Our Region
DOC.criteria: Children with BMI over 95 percentile Obesity secondary to medication use Obesity secondary to genetic disease
